activities: Engrade is a set of educational classroom tools such as online grade book, attendance, homework calendar, online quizzes, secure messaging, wikis, and discussions. In order to create an Engrade account, a user must submit a name, email, and password. Engrade users have the option of providing details about themselves such as school classes, assignments, and study materials. Most of the information Engrade collects about its users is provided voluntarily by those users when they create or update their Engrade profile. Engrade is completely private and secure.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data including username, first/last name, password, and other user inputted fields or files are covered
privacyprograms: Engrade is a participant in the TRUSTe Privacy Seal Program.
recoursemech: Engrade users may contact Engrade Relations at info@engrade.com at anytime. In addition, Engrade is a participant in the TRUSTe Privacy Seal Program. TRUSTe is an independent organization whose mission is to advance privacy and trust in the networked world. TRUSTe will serve as a liaison to work toward resolutions of any concerns.
